contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=May 2010}} {{Infobox football biography | name= Xavier Bécas | fullname = | image = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1979|5|31}} | birth_place = [[Tarbes]], [[France]] | height = {{height|m=1.71}} | currentclub = [[Pau FC]] | clubnumber = | position = [[Midfielder]] | youthyears1 = | youthclubs1 = | years1 = 1997-2000 | years2 = 2000-2001 | years3 = 2001-2002 | years4 = 2003 | years5 = 2003-2004 | years6 = 2004-2005 | years7 = 2005-2006 | years8 = 2006-2007 | years9 = 2007-2008 | years10 = 2009- | clubs1 = [[Pau FC]] | clubs2 = [[CS Sedan Ardennes|Sedan]] | clubs3 = [[AC Ajaccio]] | clubs4 = [[FC Metz|Metz]] | clubs5 = [[FC Gueugnon]] | clubs6 = Pau FC | clubs7 = AC Ajaccio | clubs8 = [[FC Istres|Istres]] | clubs9 = [[Tarbes Pyrénées Football|Tarbes Pyrénées]] | clubs10 = Pau FC | caps1 = | caps2 = 5 | caps3 = 55 | caps4 = 13 | caps5 = 9 | caps6 = | caps7 = 1 | caps8 = 6 | caps9 = | goals1 = | goals2 = 0 | goals3 = 8 | goals4 = 0 | goals5 = 0 | goals6 = | goals7 = 0 | goals8 = 0 | goals9 = | nationalyears1 = | nationalteam1 = | nationalcaps1 = | nationalgoals1 = | manageryears1 = | managerclubs1 = | pcupdate = 16:11, 26 November 2009 (UTC) | ntupdate = }} '''Xavier Bécas''' (born May 31, 1979 in [[Tarbes]]) is a [[France|French]] professional [[Association football|football]] player. Currently, he plays in the [[Championnat de France amateur]] for [[Pau FC]]. He played on the professional level in [[Ligue 1]] for [[CS Sedan Ardennes]] and [[AC Ajaccio]] and in [[Ligue 2]] for AC Ajaccio, [[FC Metz]], [[FC Gueugnon]] and [[FC Istres]]. ==External links== {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Becas, Xavier | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Footballer | DATE OF BIRTH =1979-05-31 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Tarbes]], [[France]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Becas, Xavier}} [[Category:1979 births]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:French footballers]] [[Category:Ligue 1 players]] [[Category:Ligue 2 players]] [[Category:CS Sedan Ardennes players]] [[Category:AC Ajaccio players]] [[Category:FC Metz players]] [[Category:FC Gueugnon players]] [[Category:FC Istres players]] [[Category:Pau FC players]] {{France-footy-midfielder-1970s-stub}}
